captions.text: Everyone but me is in love.

Don't cry, don't cry,
don't cry, don't cry.
Of course he broke up with me.
Why would anyone want to date me?
- I mean, no one would miss it
He probably misses me so much right now.
I lose everything that matters to me.
He's never gonna call me ever again. (sniffles)

I'll never be able to
eat at a restaurant again
because I can't go to a restaurant alone.

That sad, weird girl eating
alone at a restaurant?
- Oh yeah, I forgot to tell you.
Patrick said he had a crush on you.

title: Thoughts You Have After A Breakup

comments.author: Airay Gasai

comments.text:
Shit, I eat at restaurants alone all of the time. It's nice. Not date 
restaurants, but I live up the street from this sports bar I like and I go 
there all the time at like 1:00 in the afternoon and just eat a burger and 
be by myself. You just tell the waiter if they ask if anyone is joining you 
that you just are grabbing a bite to eat by yourself. I'm twenty years old 
and haven't really done the relationship thing - trust me, if you go long 
enough, you learn to just live with it instead of complaining about it. The 
pain kind of numbs eventually. I know that sounds depressing, but it's just 
life. And trust me, I made it through high school without going to Prom 
with someone (I went to junior prom with some friends, but I skipped senior 
prom). It's not that big of a deal and you realize quickly that dating in 
high school is just a way of figuring out what you like, a sort of trial 
for real life. But it's not necessary for going out into the real world.﻿

comments.author: wolf night

comments.text:
I had this friend and we went to school together, and started dating in the 
end of eighth grade. Then we went to different high schools, and it broke 
my heart a little every time I saw him. So I broke up with him, and he was 
sad for weeks. Then he was in a really bad car accident and got amnesia. 
Most of his memories came back, except any with me in them. It was like his 
brain decided to suppress any sad memories, and so I was just... gone. 
Sorry if that is too sad but you asked so...
